text: Trent Park Cemetery chapel Plaque marking the opening of the cemetery View of graves Trent Park Cemetery is a cemetery run by the Islington and Camden Cemetery Services located in Cockfosters Road, Cockfosters, north London.https://iccslondon.co.uk/the-sites/trent-park-cemetery/ It is adjacent to Cockfosters tube station and Trent Park. ==Style== The cemetery is of a lawn style with only bronze or granite memorial plaques laid flat allowed. ==History== Trent Park Cemetery was opened in 1960.Trent Park Cemetery. London Borough of Islington. Retrieved 7 July 2015. It was built on land in agricultural use within Trent Park that originally formed part of Enfield Chase hunting park.Trent Park Cemetery. London Gardens Online, 2012. Retrieved 7 July 2015. ==References== ==External links== *Map of Trent Park Cemetery. title: Trent Park Cemetery
